name: Explore Tallinn's Old Town
description: Wander through the cobblestone streets of Tallinn's medieval Old Town, a UNESCO World Heritage site.

name: Lahemaa National Park Visit
description: Explore the diverse landscapes of Lahemaa National Park, featuring forests, bogs, and coastline.

name: Saaremaa Island Escape
description: Discover the serene beauty of Saaremaa, Estonia's largest island, known for its windmills and castles.

name: Visit Pärnu Beach
description: Relax on the sandy beaches of Pärnu, a popular summer retreat with a charming town.

name: Tartu University Visit
description: Explore the historic Tartu University, a hub of Estonian culture and education.

name: Kadriorg Palace and Park
description: Admire the baroque architecture of Kadriorg Palace, surrounded by beautifully landscaped gardens.

name: Kumu Art Museum
description: Visit Kumu, the award-winning art museum in Tallinn, showcasing Estonian art.

name: Soomaa National Park Canoeing
description: Canoe through the picturesque wetlands of Soomaa National Park, famous for its ‘fifth season’ floods.

name: Tour the Narva Castle
description: Explore the imposing Narva Castle on the border with Russia, offering rich history and great views.

name: Setomaa Cultural Experience
description: Immerse in the unique culture of the Seto people in southeastern Estonia, known for their traditions and cuisine.
